nodes.text: Rey Meets BB-8 is a young readers book in the World of Reading series by Elizabeth Schaefer that adapts scenes from Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The book, a level one title, was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on December 18, 2015. The book comprises 32 pages, and is intended for children ages six through eight.
Rey's life is turned upside down when she meets a little droid named BB-8.
